game.title: Mystery Mansion
game.synopsis: A young detective receives a letter informing them of a mysterious event taking place in an old mansion. Intrigued, the detective decides to investigate the mansion to uncover the truth behind the strange happenings. As they explore the mansion, they encounter various puzzles and clues that lead them closer to the truth. Along the way, they come across suspicious characters who may be involved in the mystery. Eventually, the detective unravels the dark secrets hidden within the mansion, leading to a climactic confrontation with the mastermind responsible for the strange events. The game ends with the detective solving the mystery and bringing the culprit to justice.
